name: Courier Service
description: In view of the festive season, there might be delays in the Singpost's normal mail delivery. To ensure timely receipt and trackability of your order, please either opt for registered mail or courier service. The Details -We use TAQBIN's reliable next working day courier service for this. -Please note that 'next working day delivery' means from the day that the parcel is picked up from us. -This service is at a flat $4.00 on top of the $1.95 flat fee shipping that is applicable for every order. If you are opting for courier service, please leave your contact number under 'instructions' when you are at the paypal checkout page. Have questions? Contact us!
